name: JoAnn Schinderle
bio:
JOANN SCHINDERLE is a comic, actress, writer and producer living in Portland, OR. Her MidWestern roots paired with inherited snarky charm will make you feel like she's your best friend letting you in a social awareness dirty little secret. JoAnn has been seen on LaughsTV, Rooftop Comedy, VICE, and has performed in such festivals as All Jane, Bridgetown, Bumbershoot, Chicago Comedy Expo, Hell Yes Fest, SF Sketchfest, and the Out of Bounds Comedy Festival.

As an actress JoAnn is rep'd by the top NW talent agency, Option Talent; wherein she has landed both national and local commercials. As a writer, Schinderle works with LaughStaff, Live Wire Radio, and has won several rounds of Competitive Erotic Fan Fiction. When not hosting at Helium Comedy Club- Portland, Schinderle produces a high profile weekly comedy showcase called, CONTROL YOURSELF. CONTROL YOURSELF (featured in Paste Magazine, Voted 'Top 5 Local Comedy Showcases by the Willamette Week in '14/'15/'16) recently celebrated it's 3rd year running. CY is also produced as a podcast found on iTunes & Soundcloud. If you enjoy friendly banter and/or can connect with 'person of singleness' woe's, follow JoAnn on twitter @joannlizabeth.
